sentences.english: Objective To improve the performance level and awareness of CT imaging with brain abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对脑脓肿CT影像学表现的认识和诊断水平。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the causes, diagnosis and treatment of retroperitoneal abscesses.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹膜后脓肿的病因，诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experiences in diagnosis and treatment of peritonsillar abscess.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨扁桃体周围脓肿诊断治疗的经验。

sentences.english: Ethmoid sinusitis is frequently complicated in children by orbital cellulitis and abscess.
sentences.chinese: 筛窦炎在儿童中常并发眼眶蜂窝织炎及脓肿。

sentences.english: In addition, wounds and abscesses from fighting may need treatment.
sentences.chinese: 此外，从伤口和脓肿战斗需要治疗。

sentences.english: Can You Pop an Abscessed Tooth?
sentences.chinese: 你能弹出一个牙床脓肿？。

sentences.english: This is a cerebral abscess. There is a liquefactive center with yellow pus surrounded by a thin wall.
sentences.chinese: 脑脓肿，可见薄壁并附有黄色脓液的液化中心。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effect of handing and surgical therapy an fractured crown root complicated with periodontal abscess.
sentences.chinese: 对后牙冠根纵折伴牙周脓肿手术治疗的疗效进行评价。

sentences.english: Objective To explore treatment methods of pelvic abscesses.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨盆腔脓肿的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Do you think the lesion could be an abscess?
sentences.chinese: 你是否认为那损伤有可能是脓肿？

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnostic accuracy of non-puerperal breast abscess.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高非产后期乳腺脓肿的诊断准确性。

sentences.english: The purulent exudate with some hemorrhage is seen at the right in the abscess center.
sentences.chinese: 右侧脓肿中央可见伴出血的脓性分泌物渗出。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience in diagnosis and surgical treatment of bacteria liver abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结细菌性肝脓肿的临床诊断和外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: Echocardiography found vegetations in 6 cases, spleen abscess in 1 case.
sentences.chinese: 超声心动图发现赘生物6例，脾脓肿1例。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze and summarize the clinical characteristics and therapeutic experiences in children brain abscess(BA).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析总结儿童脑脓肿的临床发病特点及治疗经验。

sentences.english: Obective Discussion on spinal tuberculosis with cold sex abscess diagnostic value.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声对脊柱结核伴寒性脓肿的诊断价值。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
